mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.code AS "code", a.product_id AS "product.id", a.std AS "std", a.version AS "version", a.enable AS "enable", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", product.name AS "product.name"
LEFT JOIN business_product product ON product.id = a.product_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_route_main( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, code, product_id, std, version, enable, remarks, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{product.id}, #{std}, #{version}, #{enable}, #{remarks}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE base_route_main SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, code = #{code}, product_id = #{product.id}, std = #{std}, version = #{version}, enable = #{enable}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
